channel.title: uncount on Playing with data
channel.description: Recent content in uncount on Playing with data

item.title: Function of the week: uncount
item.description: Background I like the idea of short posts focussing on one function because there are so many great functions out there. I had been thinking about doing a function a week for a while. A post a week is way too ambitious but a month sounds better than most other time periods so I am sticking with it. Uncount A function that I think is really under appreciated is uncount.
